name: Almastriga: Relics of Azathoth
description:
An erotic 2D Action-RPG, Almastriga will have you explore, fight, and seduce your way through an army of demonic ne'er-do-wells!

The war has ended and Jane, an experienced soldier, is finally on her way home after a long campaign. She seeks nothing more than a moment of well deserved peace, however fate has something different in store for her. During her voyage, a wicked storm brews and an ancient evil awakens. Eldritch abominations begin to tear into her world, and Jane is the only one who can set the world to rights.



From man-eating mutants to seductive succubi, a menagerie of monsters stand in Jane's path. She wields a secret weapon though- a perverted curse allows allows her to tame her foes through sexual acts.

  • Animated Sex Scenes- detailed hand-drawn erotic encounters
  • NPC Companions- a town hub of colorful, memorable NPCs to befriend!
  • 2D Action Combat- delve into the unknown and fight your way through to safety!
  • Expand Your Arsenal- find and utilize a variety of unique weapons in the game!
